question: What are the circumstances under which a student is shown the door and asked to leave the campus ?
answer:
As per the Academic Regulations 
(Link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1le3h9A7CZcCAGScwAxRrMxrKJD5Kfmq1 ) and 
Disciplinary manual 
(Link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1Ya5MpIJbAnXZ-sZK-X5UCg-0en03X13z )
One student must leave if:
• If a student gets a CGPA less than 6.00 in three consecutive semesters, he must leave the Institute.
• After first year if the CGPA < 5.00
• As per the clause P-24 and P-25 of disciplinary manual, outright expulsion from the institute can also be a step under certain circumstances
